aboutUs.subtitle: Building bridges between cultures through education since 1997

missionVision.title: Our Mission & Vision
missionVision.mission: At Liceul Teoretic German "Johann Ettinger", we strive to provide excellent bilingual education that bridges German and Romanian cultures while preparing students for global opportunities.
missionVision.vision: Our vision is to be a leading institution in bilingual education, fostering cultural understanding and academic excellence while nurturing responsible global citizens.

1997.title: School Foundation
1997.desc: Establishment of the German theoretical high school in Satu Mare.

2005.title: DSD Program Implementation
2005.desc: Introduction of the German Language Diploma (DSD) program.

2010.title: International Partnerships
2010.desc: Establishment of key partnerships with German schools and institutions.

2023.title: Modern Campus Development
2023.desc: Expansion and modernization of school facilities and programs.

academicExcellence.title: Academic Excellence
academicExcellence.desc: We maintain high academic standards and promote critical thinking through bilingual education.

culturalUnderstanding.title: Cultural Understanding
culturalUnderstanding.desc: We foster appreciation for both German and Romanian cultures, promoting diversity and inclusion.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We embrace modern teaching methods and technologies while maintaining traditional educational values.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

login.subtitle: Sign in to access the school portal
login.authProblems: Authentication problems? Contact the school administrator.

errors.userNotFound: User not found in the system. Please check your username.
errors.wrongCredentials: Wrong username or password. Please try again.
errors.authError: Authentication error. Please check your username and password.

erasmus.title: Erasmus Projects We Are Involved In
erasmus.description: For over 8 years, our school has been actively involved in Erasmus projects, collaborating with educational institutions from all over Europe. These projects span both primary and high school education, allowing our students to engage in cross-cultural learning experiences and fostering international partnerships.

specialEvents.title: Special Events at Our School
specialEvents.subtitle: Our school is not just about academics. We also celebrate creativity, fun, and tradition through various special events throughout the year. Here are some of our highlights:

studentsVsTeachers.title: Students vs Teachers Match (12th Grade)
studentsVsTeachers.desc: A friendly, yet emotional match between students and teachers from the 12th grade, held annually.

christmasMarket.title: Weihnachtsbasar (Christmas Market)
christmasMarket.desc: The school's Christmas market, where students and teachers collaborate to sell traditional and handmade products.

eratosthenes.title: Eratosthenes Experiment
eratosthenes.desc: A fascinating experiment that allows students to measure the Earth's circumference using only the shadow of a pillar and geography.

video.title: A quick video to summarize our school experience
video.description: Watch this short video that captures the essence of our school, from the vibrant classroom activities to the exciting extracurricular moments. Get a glimpse into the unique experience we offer our students.

ourTeam.title: Our Team
ourTeam.subtitle: Meet the dedicated professionals who make Liceul Teoretic German "Johann Ettinger" a center of excellence in bilingual education.

principal.description: Leading our school with dedication and commitment to educational excellence.

vicePrincipalDesc.description: Supporting school administration and coordinating educational programs.

teacherDescriptions.zsoltKuki: Inspiring students through music education and cultural activities.
teacherDescriptions.mariaTompos: Dedicated to developing students' language proficiency and literary appreciation.
teacherDescriptions.manuelaDan: Passionate about Romanian literature and cultural studies.
teacherDescriptions.renataHodor: Specialized in Romanian language teaching methodologies.
teacherDescriptions.renataVeron: Making the world of chemistry accessible and exciting for students.
teacherDescriptions.ildikoBodnar: Promoting German language skills and cultural understanding.
teacherDescriptions.anzikEster: Specializing in German language instruction and literature.
teacherDescriptions.erikaGazsa: Dedicated to developing strong mathematical foundations and problem-solving skills.
teacherDescriptions.mrPop: Helping students discover the beauty and logic of mathematics.
teacherDescriptions.mrSzekely: Encouraging critical thinking and philosophical inquiry.
teacherDescriptions.adrianTascu: Promoting physical fitness and team sports.
teacherDescriptions.sebi: Dedicated to students' physical development and sports excellence.
teacherDescriptions.bogdanStana: Making history come alive through engaging teaching methods.

ourServices.title: Our Services
ourServices.subtitle: Discover the comprehensive educational services and programs we offer to help our students excel in both German and Romanian educational systems.

cta.title: Want to Learn More About Our Services?
cta.description: Contact us to schedule a visit or learn more about our educational programs.

germanEducation.title: German Language Education
germanEducation.description: Comprehensive German language instruction from beginner to advanced levels.

features.smallClass: Small class sizes for optimal learning

international.title: International Programs
international.description: Exchange programs and international partnerships for global exposure.

features.exchange: Student exchange programs with German schools

academic.title: Academic Excellence
academic.description: Rigorous academic programs following both Romanian and German curricula.

arts.title: Arts & Music
arts.description: Comprehensive arts education including music, theater, and visual arts.

science.title: Science Labs
science.description: Modern laboratories for physics, chemistry, and biology experiments.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: Computer science courses and digital literacy programs.

support.title: Student Support
support.description: Counseling services and academic guidance for all students.

media.title: Media Center
media.description: Modern media facilities for digital learning and projects.

library.title: Library
library.description: Extensive collection of German and Romanian literature and resources.
